cast.overview: Andrew returns to his hometown for the funeral of his mother, a journey that reconnects him with past friends. The trip coincides with his decision to stop taking his powerful antidepressants. A chance meeting with Sam - a girl also suffering from various maladies - opens up the possibility of rekindling emotional attachments, confronting his psychologist father, and perhaps beginning a new life.
cast.title: Garden State

cast.original_title: Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery
cast.overview: World-famous detective Benoit Blanc heads to Greece to peel back the layers of a mystery surrounding a tech billionaire and his eclectic crew of friends.
cast.title: Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery

cast.original_title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
cast.overview: A fading actor best known for his portrayal of a popular superhero attempts to mount a comeback by appearing in a Broadway play. As opening night approaches, his attempts to become more altruistic, rebuild his career, and reconnect with friends and family prove more difficult than expected.
cast.title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)

cast.overview: College student Danielle must cover her tracks when she unexpectedly runs into her sugar daddy at a shiva - with her parents, ex-girlfriend and family friends also in attendance.
cast.title: Shiva Baby

details.biography: Jackie Hoffman was born on November 29, 1960. She is an actress and writer, known for Garden State (2004), A Dirty Shame (2004) and Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde (2003).
details.name: Jackie Hoffman
